name: Dimitrios Rafailidis
content: Dimitris Rafailidis Short Bio Hi, I am an Associate Professor at the Department of Electrical & Computer Engineering of University of Thessaly. My main research interests are Machine Learning, Information Retrieval and Data Science, and I am currently the head of the DML lab. Profiles: [Google Scholar] [DBLP] Contact: draf (at) uth (dot) gr
